game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifacts and uncover the secrets of the lost city.
game.description: Many years ago, a powerful civilization was said to have thrived in this region. Now, the ruins lie hidden deep within the jungle, waiting for brave adventurers to explore them.

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost city
tasks.description: Follow the ancient map etched on a nearby rock to locate the hidden entrance.
Navigate through the treacherous tunnels and find the pedestal with the ancient relic.
Solve the puzzle etched on the stone walls to unlock the entrance to the inner sanctum.
